#summary Adds a child at the end of current node's children

===== =====
==Description==
*appendChild* ( _SimpleXMLElement_ $new )

This function appends a child to an existing list of children or creates a new list of children.
===== =====

==Parameters==

_new_

 The appended child
===== =====
==Return Values==

The node added.
===== =====
==Errors/Exceptions==
This function throws [http://php.net/manual/ref.dom.php#dom.class.domexception DOMException]
===== =====
==Examples==

The following example will add a new element node to a fresh document.
===== =====
==See also==
